__e: I guess there's nothing we can do now except send out a distress signal and wait to be rescued.
We just had a distress call from the clinic. They haven't been able to reach them again.
Hey, put me out of my misery. It taught me something, John.
You received a distress call from two sisters in a disabled ship, right?
May I ask what the joke was, that caused so much entertainment on one side, and so much distress on the other? Nothing.
My cheek keeps the memory of my brother's despair.
